paragraph1: Get together with your friends, work colleagues, relatives ... and organize your own party. Tips, makeup, beauty treatments, popcorn, drinks, sweets ... and laughs! You fancy?
paragraph2: To organize a Beauty Party you just have to contact In & Out, tell us the date in which you are interested, the number of people (which should be more than 4) and the treatment pack you want to enjoy. During the Beauty Parties, In & Out remains closed to the public, so for very specific dates it is recommended to book early.
title2: Special Treatments packs for Beauty Parties
paragraph3: In addition to these packs, we also offer you the possibility of designing your personalized pack based on your tastes. Get in touch with In & Out and tell us what you want for your Beauty Party ðŸ˜‰
